name: Art of Balance
description: Discover "Art of Balance" - one of the best rated and most fun Wii U™ Games (Nintendo Life 9/10, Nintendo Enthusiast 9/10, N-Tower 9/10)! 200 levels will challenge your skills and imagination. With its perfect gameplay and almost photo realistic graphics 'Art of Balance' is easy to pick up but hard to put away. Play alone or invite friends and family to drop in at any time for co-op play. Seeking an even bigger challenge? Play online against others or try out the new Endurance mode and improve your Online-Highscore. Art of Balance brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Wii U™.
